attributes.action: Force media retractions to be given the same prominence as retracted articles
attributes.additional_details:
Headlines often make big claims in front page headlines that are subsequently retracted, but the retractions are usually published on an inside page, in a small article.

An example of an article that was retracted: https://vice-images.vice.com/images/articles/meta/2015/11/24/i-conducted-the-muslim-poll-the-sun-jihadi-sympathy-1448380391.png

The retraction: https://vice-images.vice.com/images/articles/meta/2015/11/24/i-conducted-the-muslim-poll-the-sun-jihadi-sympathy-1448380391.png
attributes.background: Retractions should be published in the same position and with the same size lettering as the retracted article.  People have a right to be alerted to false information in the press.
